front.title: Preserving MIPv6 communications when the HoA becomes unreachable

abstract.t: This note proposes a modification to the MIPv6 specification in orderto allow the preservation of established communications when the pathbetween the MN and the CN through the HoA becomes unavailable. Theproposed modification essentially consists on allowing the extensionof BCE lifetime upon the reception of ICMP Destination Unreachablemessage as reply to a Binding Refresh Request (BRR) message.
